Be the brave Tornado Chasers Jeep Driver in Storm Lightning weather. Donâ€™t afraid with thunderstorm and continue Jeep Driving Simulator on the mountain. Do you want to become the tornado hunter? Yes? This Tornado Chasers Jeep Driving Simulator 2019 is the best chance for you to be the Real Tornado Storm Hunter. Drive carefully and donâ€™t damage your Tornado Car. Keep your eagleâ€™s eye on the Tornado Fight and test your best tornado hunter car driving skills. Itâ€™s not easy to be a Storm Lightning Tornado Fighter, you need to perform best Tornado Car Stunts, maintain your Storm Car Speed and get escape from crazy hurdles and obstacles. Experience this one of the best Tornado simulator game.

In Amazing Tornado Chasers Run you will be driving in a police car hunting for big dangerous tornadoes. Donâ€™t drive too close you donâ€™t want to damage your expensive police car, do you? Ever wanted to be a tornado hunter? This is your chance to become one in Amazing Tornado Hunter Run! In this amazing run tornado games, itâ€™s your job to hunt the tornadoâ€™s but they will get stronger and stronger so watch out! Keep your eyes on the horizon and try to spot one. Save the citizens of the dangerous tornadoâ€™s and you will become a hero!
